snippet.title: Space War Arena
snippet.description:
Space War Arena is a brand-new strategy action game with real-time tactical space combat coming exclusively to the Nintendo Switch on February 14th!

Direct the tides of war in lightning fast strategic battles and unleash astonishing arsenals against opposing fleets to destroy their bases and claim their space. Build an armada from 30+ different types of evolving units, unleash your cunning, adapt to the enemy, and command your fleet in epic AI encounters or vicious same-screen multiplayer. Engage!
